titleStmt.title: A defence of the Ansvver to a paper intituled The case of the dissenting Protestants of Ireland in reference to a bill of indulgence, from the exceptions lately made against it.
titleStmt.author: Pullen, Tobias, 1648-1713.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Answer to a paper intituled The case of the dissenting Protestants of Ireland.
Reproduction of the original in the Trinity College Library, Dublin.
